Class BuildRuleFactoryParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.BuildRuleFactoryParams

extends Object

      • getRequiredFileAsPathRelativeToProjectRoot

        public String getRequiredFileAsPathRelativeToProjectRoot(String attributeName)
        Convenience method that combines the result of getRequiredStringAttribute(String) with resolveFilePathRelativeToBuildFileDirectory(String).

      • resolveFilePathRelativeToBuildFileDirectory

        public String resolveFilePathRelativeToBuildFileDirectory(String path)
        For the specified string, return a corresponding file path that is relative to the project root. It is expected that path is a path relative to the directory containing the build file in which it was declared. This method will also assert that the file exists.

        However, if path corresponds to a generated file, then path is treated as a path relative to the parallel build file directory in the generated files directory. In that case, its existence will not be verified.

      • resolveAndCreateFilePathRelativeToBuildFileDirectory

        public String resolveAndCreateFilePathRelativeToBuildFileDirectory(String path)

      • resolveDirectoryRelativeToBuildFileDirectory

        public File resolveDirectoryRelativeToBuildFileDirectory(String path)

      • asSourcePath

        public SourcePath asSourcePath(String resource,
                      AbstractBuildRuleBuilder<?> builder)
        Parameters:
        resource - that identifies either a file path or a build target.
        builder - If resource corresponds to a BuildTarget, that build target will be added to the deps of this builder.
        Returns:
        a source path that corresponds to the specified resource.

      • getOptionalSourcePath

        public Optional<SourcePath> getOptionalSourcePath(String identifier,
                                         AbstractBuildRuleBuilder<?> builder)
        If there is a string value associated with the specified identifier, this returns a SourcePath that corresponds to that value.
        Parameters:
        identifier - for the argument in this params.
        builder - If resource corresponds to a BuildTarget, that build target will be added to the deps of this builder.
        Returns:
        a source path that corresponds to the specified identifier.

      • getNullableListAttribute

        @Nullable
public List<String> getNullableListAttribute(String attributeName)
        This is similar to getOptionalListAttribute(String), except if the value associated with attributeName is null, then this method actually returns null rather than an empty list.
